'''Firefoot''' was the horse ridden by [[Éomer]] of the [[Rohirrim]] on the journey from [[Edoras]] to [[Helm's Deep]]. During the journey, Éomer invited [[Gimli]] to be a passenger on Firefoot's back with him, a proposition which Gimli accepted with great pleasure.<ref>{{TT|III6}}</ref>
